questions.text: Which of the following phenomena is responsible for seeing your image in a mirror?
On a very warm day, looking into the distance you see the space in front of you slightly distorted. What is happening?

answerChoices.text: Light is bending as it moves between air of different temperatures.
The temperature is so high that your eye is able to see waves of heat.
You are perceiving infrared waves given off by the sun.
